command: [withheld — non-actionable: would open an IPv6 TCP socket (AF_INET6) scoped to a link-local interface and transmit base64-encoded file data to a high, uncommon port]
explanation: Conceptually demonstrates T1011 by using an alternate network medium (IPv6 link-local) instead of the likely primary IPv4/HTTPS channel to exfiltrate data in base64 form over TCP to a non-standard port.
rationale_steps: Select IPv6 link-local as the medium distinct from primary IPv4
Base64-encode the target data to avoid binary anomalies
Open AF_INET6/SOCK_STREAM and connect using a scope ID for the specific interface
Send data to a high-numbered, uncommon TCP port
